description: Joined The University of Texas at Dallas to pursue ‘MS in Business Analytics and Artificial Intelligence’ with a minor in ‘Machine Learning’

Showcased findings of developing an efficient neural network that improved photometric redshift estimates by 70% thereby reducing estimation time, at the 10th ICICSE. The event was sponsored by Springer and the Computer Society of India.

Earned the Infosys Insta Award for successfully developing and deploying a multilingual chatbot using Microsoft Bot Framework and Azure LogicApps for customer support, resulting in a 13% increase in client leads.
Joined Infosys as ‘Systems Engineer’, I'm officially an Infocian
‘Virtual Reality: The New Reality’, m first writing was published in CSI Communications July 2020 Edition
